appName: Tales of Sintra: The Dark Vortex

descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

displayName: Tales of Sintra: The Dark Vortex
display_name: Tales of Sintra: The Dark Vortex
display_long_description:
Face the Dark Vortex in an action-adventure filled with puzzles, where magic and physical combat intertwine in a world threatened by darkness.

Wield mythical weapons—two swords, a bow, and a shield—and defeat legendary guardians like the fearsome dragon and the mighty golem. Unlock their spells and enchant your weapons to access new areas and face increasingly intense challenges.

Choose your fighting style: dual-wield swords, combine sword and shield, or master the bow from a distance. Adapt your tactics to each enemy and find the strategy that suits you best.

Explore ancient ruins, castles, fortresses, and temples, where environmental puzzles will put your wits to the test. Every challenge you overcome brings you closer to uncovering the truth behind the vortex.

Immerse yourself in a visually stunning world that blends dark dungeons with majestic outdoor landscapes—crafted to deliver a complete and unforgettable VR experience.
